I am a meat eater.

content.text: Hey, my name is [your name].
Hi, I'm [user 2's name].
What do you do for fun?
I like to watch anime, read manga, and play video games.
Nice! I like to watch anime too. What are some of your favorites?
I like a lot of different anime, but my favorites are "Fullmetal Alchemist", "Death Note", and "Code Geass".
I've heard good things about those shows. I've only seen a few episodes of "Fullmetal Alchemist", but I really liked it.
It's a great show. It's a little dark at times, but it's really good.
I know what you mean. I'm not usually into dark shows, but I really liked "Death Note".
"Death Note" is really good. It's a really interesting concept.
Yeah, it is. I'm not usually into shows about serial killers, but I really liked the way "Death Note" handled it.
Me too. It was a really creative way to tell a story about a serial killer.
Yeah, it was. So, what other kinds of shows do you like to watch?
I like a lot of different kinds of shows. I like action, comedy, drama, horror, and everything in between.
Me too. I like to watch a little bit of everything.
What are some of your favorite shows?
I like a lot of different shows, but some of my favorites are "The Office", "Parks and Recreation", "The Good Place", and "Game of Thrones".
I've heard good things about all of those shows. I've only seen a few episodes of "Game of Thrones", but I really liked it.
It's a great show. It's a little slow at times, but it's really good.
I know what you mean. I'm not usually into fantasy shows, but I really liked "Game of Thrones".
Yeah, it's a little different than other fantasy shows. It's a lot more realistic.
That's what I liked about it. It felt more like a historical drama than a fantasy show.
Yeah, it did. I think that's why it's so popular.
I agree. I think it's a really good show.
